column1: Smoque BBQ////Saturday night was busy and the line went out the door.  Even though you don't get a waiter
column2: a host seats your party.  I had the full slab of baby back ribs
column6: and brisket chili.  Everything was good
column7: but the 2 sauces weren't my favorite.  Also
column8: I saw a table bring their own beer in. byob
